item.title: Iris, I ended up in a state of shock because someone cancelled on me. Why do I react so strongly?
item.description: Question This morning I asked an acquaintance, a friend, if I could visit him next week and then he said that unfortunately he wouldn’t be there that day.

item.title: Iris, I'm getting into super quick arguments with others right now? Can you tell me why?
item.description: Question I also have two questions. The first is that I’ve noticed that lately I get into arguments very quickly, not with all people, but with a few people, and with one friend I don’t talk at all.

item.title: Iris, why are we humans sometimes indifferent to very significant things?
item.description: Question Yes, I have recently been dealing a lot with indifference as a phenomenon.

item.title: Iris, why do I get so tired of watching commercials and shopping?
item.description: Question And the other question is that I often notice that I’m very tired.

item.title: Iris, can you also see the atmosphere of a person via zoom?
item.description: Question Iris, in the introduction you said that you look into the atmosphere from time to time and read what you see there.

item.title: Iris, did people have more energy to work in the past?
item.description: Question I often encounter the phenomenon that people tell me that people used to have more energy.

item.title: Iris, what does a person's atmosphere look like?
item.description: Question What does the atmosphere of a human being look like or what is everything in the atmosphere of a human being?
